verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Was Given <S%G1325><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> A Reed <S%G2563><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> A Staff, <S%G4464><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%>, Rise, <S%G1453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Measure <S%G3354><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Alter, <S%G2379><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Worship <S%G4352><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Court <S%G833><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Is Within <S%G2081><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> Cast <S%G1544><s%>, Out, <S%G1854><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Measure; <S%G3354><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> It Was Given Up <S%G1325><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Nations, <S%G1484><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Shall They Trample Upon <S%G3961><s%> Months <S%G3376><s%> Forty <S%G5062><s%> Two. <S%G1417><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Give Power <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1417><s%> <S%G3144><s%> To My Two Witnesses, <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Shall Prophesy <S%G4395><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> A Thousand <S%G5507><s%> Two Hundred And <S%G1250><s%> Sixty, <S%G1835><s%> Clothed In <S%G4016><s%> Sackcloth. <S%G4526><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Olive Trees, <S%G1636><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Lampstands <S%G3087><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Before <S%G1799><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Stand. <S%G2476><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Should Will <S%G2309><s%> To Injure, <S%G91><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> Goes Out <S%G1607><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Their, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Devours <S%G2719><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2190><s%> Their Enemies. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Should Will <S%G2309><s%> To Injure, <S%G91><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> <S%G1163><s%> Must He <S%G846><s%> Be Killed. <S%G615><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> To Shut <S%G2808><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> No <S%G3361><s%> May Fall <S%G1026><s%> Rain <S%G5205><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Of Their <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Prophecy; <S%G4394><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> They Have <S%G2192><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Waters, <S%G5204><s%> To Turn <S%G4762><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Blood, <S%G129><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Smite <S%G3960><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> With Every <S%G3956><s%> Plague, <S%G4127><s%> As Often As <S%G3740><s%> <S%G1437><s%> They May Will. <S%G2309><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> They Shall Have Completed <S%G5055><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3141><s%> Their Testimony, <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beast <S%G2342><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Comes Up <S%G305><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Abyss <S%G12><s%> Will Make <S%G4160><s%> War <S%G4171><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Overcome <S%G3528><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Will Kill <S%G615><s%> Them : <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bodies <S%G4430><s%> Their Will Be <S%G846><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Street <S%G4113><s%> Of City <S%G4172><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> Which <S%G3748><s%> Is Called <S%G2564><s%> Spiritually <S%G4153><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Was Crucified. <S%G4717><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Shall See Some <S%G991><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Peoples <S%G2992><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tribes <S%G5443><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Tongues <S%G1100><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bodies <S%G4430><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Half, <S%G2255><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4430><s%> Their Bodies <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> They Will Suffer <S%G863><s%> To Be Put <S%G5087><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Tombs. <S%G3418><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They That <S%G3588><s%> Dwell <S%G2730><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Will Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> ' Over <S%G1909><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Will Make Merry, <S%G2165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gifts <S%G1435><s%> Will Send <S%G3992><s%> To One Another, <S%G240><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> These, <S%G3778><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Prophets, <S%G4396><s%> Tormented <S%G928><s%> Them That <S%G3588><s%> Dwell <S%G2730><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> After <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Half, The <S%G2255><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Of Life <S%G2222><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Did Enter <S%G1525><s%> ' Into <S%G1909><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Stood <S%G2476><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Feet <S%G4228><s%> Their; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Fall <S%G4098><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Beholding <S%G2334><s%>, Them : <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Heard <S%G191><s%> A Voice <S%G5456><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Come Up <S%G305><s%> Hither. <S%G5602><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Went Up <S%G305><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cloud; <S%G3507><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Beheld <S%G2334><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2190><s%> Their Enemies. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> There Was <S%G1096><s%> Earthquake <S%G4578><s%> A Great, <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tenth <S%G1182><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Fell, <S%G4098><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Were Killed <S%G615><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earthquake <S%G4578><s%> Names <S%G3686><s%> Of Men <S%G444><s%> Thousand <S%G5505><s%> Seven. <S%G2033><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rest <S%G3062><s%> Afraid <S%G1719><s%> Became, <S%G1096><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seventh <S%G1442><s%> Angel <S%G32><s%> Sounded His Trumpet; <S%G4537><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were <S%G1096><s%> Voices <S%G5456><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Are Become <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdoms <S%G932><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Our Lord's, <S%G2257><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5547><s%> His Christ's <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Shall Reign <S%G936><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> We Give Thanks <S%G2168><s%> To Thee, <S%G4671><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Almighty, <S%G3841><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Is, <S%G5607><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Was, <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%>, Coming, <S%G2064><s%> That Thou <S%G3754><s%> Hast Taken <S%G2983><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Reigned. <S%G936><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Were Angry, <S%G3710><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Is Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Wrath <S%G3709><s%> Thy, <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> To Be Judged, <S%G2919><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Reward <S%G3408><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1401><s%> To Thy Bondmen <S%G4675><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets, <S%G4396><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Saints, <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Fear <S%G5399><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> Thy Name, <S%G4675><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Small <S%G3398><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Great; <S%G3173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Bring To Corruption <S%G1311><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Corrupt <S%G1311><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was Opened <S%G455><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G3485><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Seen <S%G3700><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ark <S%G2787><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1242><s%> Of His Covenant <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3485><s%> His Temple : <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> There Were <S%G1096><s%> Lightnings <S%G796><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Voices <S%G5456><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Thunders <S%G1027><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> An Earthquake <S%G4578><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hail <S%G5464><s%> Great. <S%G3173><s%>
